slides.title: Key Concepts
slides.content:
# Key Concepts ðŸ§¬

## Qubits:
```
Classical bit: 0 OR 1
Qubit: 0 AND 1 (superposition)
```

## Properties:
| Concept | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| Superposition | Multiple states at once |
| Entanglement | Linked qubits |
| Interference | Combine probabilities |

## Power:
- 50 qubits â‰ˆ supercomputer
- Exponential scaling

slides.title: Applications
slides.content:
# Quantum Applications ðŸŽ¯

## Suited For:
- Cryptography
- Drug discovery
- Optimization
- Machine learning
- Financial modeling

## Libraries:
```python
# IBM Qiskit
from qiskit import QuantumCircuit

qc = QuantumCircuit(2)
qc.h(0)  # Hadamard gate
qc.cx(0, 1)  # CNOT gate
result = execute(qc, simulator).result()
```

## Cloud Access:
- IBM Quantum
- Amazon Braket
- Google Quantum AI
